title: React for Beginners
description: Complete beginner guide to React.js. Learn components, hooks, state management, and build your first modern web application from scratch.

title: Advanced Machine Learning
description: Deep dive into machine learning concepts. Master neural networks, deep learning, and advanced algorithms used in real-world AI applications.

title: UI/UX Design Fundamentals
description: Learn the principles of beautiful user interface design. Master color theory, typography, layout, and create stunning digital experiences.

title: Python Data Science Masterclass
description: Comprehensive Python course for data science. Learn pandas, numpy, matplotlib, and machine learning with hands-on projects.

title: JavaScript ES6+ Complete Guide
description: Master modern JavaScript from ES6 to ES2023. Arrow functions, destructuring, async/await, modules, and all the latest features.

title: Cloud Computing with AWS
description: Become an AWS certified cloud practitioner. Learn EC2, S3, Lambda, and deploy scalable applications on Amazon Web Services.

title: Mobile App Development with Flutter
description: Build beautiful cross-platform mobile apps with Flutter and Dart. Create iOS and Android apps from a single codebase.

title: Cybersecurity Fundamentals
description: Learn essential cybersecurity concepts. Understand threats, vulnerabilities, encryption, and how to protect systems from attacks.

title: Docker & Kubernetes Mastery
description: Containerize applications with Docker and orchestrate with Kubernetes. Master CI/CD pipelines and modern deployment strategies.

title: Figma for Web Designers
description: Create professional web designs in Figma. Learn auto-layout, components, prototyping, and design handoff workflows.

title: Node.js Backend Development
description: Build scalable backend APIs with Node.js and Express. Learn authentication, database integration, and RESTful API design.

title: Blockchain Development
description: Develop decentralized applications with Ethereum and Solidity. Learn smart contracts, Web3, and DeFi fundamentals.
